children.text: Igor Unguryanov is a Senior Environment Artist based in Kaliningrad, Russia, with over 6 years of experience in the game industry. He specializes in creating high-quality environments for games, combining manual modeling with procedural generation techniques using Houdini.

With a strong background in both artistic and technical aspects of environment art, Igor has successfully led teams, managed outsource pipelines, and delivered content for various platforms using Unreal Engine 5 and Unity.

achievements: Creation of locations for game projects and procedural generation with Houdini.
Manual asset creation (Blender 3D) and texturing across various pipelines.
Coordinated outsource team of 10 specialists (Environment / Props / Level Design).
Planning, prioritization, and quality control of art assets.
Communication with producers and clients, managing scope and risks.
Development and improvement of art pipelines.
Grayboxing locations and modeling environment objects (exterior/interior).
Creating props, UV mapping, LODs, and texturing.
Optimization and setup of objects in the game engine.
Level design: placement of environment objects and key points.
Working in realism with PBR valid materials.
Integration and setup of models in the engine.
